column4: Anybodu know it's gonna be possible to have Amarok 2.2 on ubuntu 9.04 or is it only for Karmic?
there's probably a ppa,  also #kubuntu is the KDE channel

you can run KDE apps inside  Gnome/Ubuntu yes
